GP12vd2127_u:1: śāntātītaṃ gaṇaṃ hutvā śāntim āpnoti mānavaḥ /
GP12vd2127_u:2: bhaiṣajyaṃ ca gaṇaṃ hutvā sarvān rogān vyapohati // Vdho_2,127.1 //
GP12vd2127_u:4: kvacin nāapnoti ca bhayaṃ hutvā caivābhayaṃ gaṇam // Vdho_2,127.2 //
GP12vd2127_u:6: āyuṣyaṃ ca gaṇam hutvā cāpamṛtyūṃ vyapohati // Vdho_2,127.3 //
GP12vd2127_u:7: svastim āpnoti sarvatra hutvā svastyayanaṃ gaṇaṃ /
GP12vd2127_u:8: śreyasā yogam āpnoti śarmavarmagaṇaṃ tathā // Vdho_2,127.4 //
GP12vd2127_u:10: tathā raudragaṇaṃ hutvā sarvān doṣān vyapohati //
GP12vd2127_u:11: etair daśagaṇair homo hy aṣṭādaśasu śāntiṣu // Vdho_2,127.5 //
GP12vd2127_u:12: vaiṣṇavī śāntir aindrī ca brāhmī raudrī tathaiva ca /
GP12vd2127_u:13: vāyavyā vāruṇī caiva kauberī bhārgavī tathā // Vdho_2,127.6 //
GP12vd2127_u:15: mārudgaṇā ca gāndharvī śāntair nairṛtakī tathā // Vdho_2,127.7 //
GP12vd2127_u:16: śāntir āṅgirasī yāmyā pārthivī ca bhṛgūttama /
GP12vd2127_u:17: etās tu śāntayaḥ proktāḥ sarvakarmahitāḥ sadā // Vdho_2,127.8 //
GP12vd2127_u:18: yas tvā mṛtyur iti hy etaj japtaṃ mṛtyuvināśanaṃ /
GP12vd2127_u:19: hutvā ca mātṛnāmāni kāmān evam avāpnuyāt // Vdho_2,127.9 //
GP12vd2127_u:20: suparṇas tveti hutvā ca bhujagair naiva bādhyate /
GP12vd2127_u:21: [Bhattacharyya edits bhujagainava bādhyate, which can be just a typo!]
GP12vd2127_u:22: yasyedaṃ bhūmyām iti ca bhūmikāmo japet sadā // Vdho_2,127.10 //
GP12vd2127_u:24: audumbaraṃ yo na iti tathā vīryavivardhanam // Vdho_2,127.11 //
GP12vd2127_u:26: hiraṇyavarṇā iti ca snānaṃ pāpaharaṃ bhavet // Vdho_2,127.12 //
GP12vd2127_u:28: sarasvatīti mantrāṃś ca viṣaghnān nirviśed budhaḥ // Vdho_2,127.13 //
GP12vd2127_u:30: imā devīti mantraś ca sarvaśāntikaraḥ paraḥ // Vdho_2,127.14 //
GP12vd2127_u:31: devā maruta ity etat sarvakāmakaraṃ bhavet /
GP12vd2127_u:32: yamasya lokād ity etad duḥsvapnaśamanaṃ paraṃ // Vdho_2,127.15 //
GP12vd2127_u:33: agner va iti cāpy etat kathitaṃ manyunāśanam /
GP12vd2127_u:34: ūrdhvo bhavati vijñeyaḥ kṛtvā sthānakaraḥ paraḥ // Vdho_2,127.16 //
GP12vd2127_u:35: indraṃ vayaṃ vaṇijam iti paṇyalābhakaraṃ param /
GP12vd2127_u:37: kāmo me rājña ity etat strīṇāṃ saubhāgyavardhanam // Vdho_2,127.17 //
GP12vd2127_u:38: bhadrāya karṇam ity etat karṇaprasyandane japet /
GP12vd2127_u:39: bhadrāsy akṣirodhe jātā karṇaprasyandane tathā // Vdho_2,127.18 //
GP12vd2127_u:40: tubyam eva jarimann āyuṣyaṃ tu hutaṃ bhavet /
GP12vd2127_u:41: āyātu mitra ity etan mitralabdhikaraṃ hutam // Vdho_2,127.19 //
GP12vd2127_u:44: agne gobhir na ity etad gavāṃ vṛddhikaraṃ param /
GP12vd2127_u:45: dvādaśāhaṃ tu juhuyāt parākeṇa viśeṣataḥ // Vdho_2,127.21 //
GP12vd2127_u:46: śānto agnir itīty etad grāmasvāsthyakaraṃ bhavet /
GP12vd2127_u:47: tasmād grāmān mṛdā kṛtvā vedisāmyaṃ samaśnute // Vdho_2,127.22 //
GP12vd2127_u:49: tribhyo rudrebhya ity etad vāstoṣpatam udāhṛtam // Vdho_2,127.23 //
GP12vd2127_u:51: acyutā dyaus tathā rāma kathitaṃ sthānalābhadam // Vdho_2,127.24 //
GP12vd2127_u:52: payo deveṣv iti hutaṃ rāyaspoṣakaraṃ param /
GP12vd2127_u:54: ayaṃ te yonir ity etat putralābhakaraṃ bhavet /
GP12vd2127_u:55: śunaṃ vatsān tathā hy etad gavāṃ vṛddhikaraṃ hutam // Vdho_2,127.26 //
GP12vd2127_u:57: ahaṃ te bhaga ity etad bhavet saubhāgyavardhanaṃ // Vdho_2,127.27 //
GP12vd2127_u:58: ye te pāśās tathāpy etad bandhanān mokṣakārakam /
GP12vd2127_u:59: yo na sva iti cāpy etac chatrunāśakaraṃ param // Vdho_2,127.28 //
GP12vd2127_u:60: sapatnahanam iti tathā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12vd2127_u:61: tvam uttamam itīty etad yaśaso vardhanaṃ param // Vdho_2,127.29 //
GP12vd2127_u:63: ā no agna ity etac ca kathitaṃ patilābhadam // Vdho_2,127.30 //
GP12vd2127_u:64: yena vehad iṣaṃ caiva garbhalābhakaraṃ bhavet /
GP12vd2127_u:65: imaṃ tapasvinn iti tathā bhavet saubhāgyavardhanam // Vdho_2,127.31 //
GP12vd2127_u:66: yat pṛthivyā anāvṛttaṃ hutam etad yathāvidhi /
GP12vd2127_u:68: kṛtvā tu śaṃsanaṃ jñeyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Vdho_2,127.32 //
GP12vd2127_u:69: śivaḥ śivābhir ity etad bhavec chreyas^karaṃ param // Vdho_2,127.33 //
GP12vd2127_u:71: bṛhaspatiḥ paripātu pathi svastyayanaṃ bhavet // Vdho_2,127.34 //
GP12vd2127_u:72: mano nv edam abhayadaṃ pathi svastyayanaṃ bhavet /
GP12vd2127_u:73: ayaṃ no agnir adhyakṣo bhaved agniprasādataḥ // Vdho_2,127.35 //
GP12vd2127_u:74: saṃvatsaraṃ tu śirasā dhārayed yo hutāśanam //
GP12vd2127_u:76: mantram etaj japen nityam āgneyāśāmukhaḥ sthitaḥ //
GP12vd2127_u:77: anagnijvalanaṃ kuryād rāma saṃvatsare gate // Vdho_2,127.36 //
GP12vd2127_u:78: dūṣyā dūṣītty etaj japen mantram anuttamam /
GP12vd2127_u:83: paramaṃ pāvanaṃ tad dhi sarvakalmaṣanāśanam // Vdho_2,127.39 //
GP12vd2127_u:84: evam ete śubhā mantrāḥ prativedaṃ mayā tava /
GP12vd2127_u:85: samāsāt kathitā rāma samuddhṛtya pradhānataḥ // Vdho_2,127.40 //
GP12vd2127_u:89: na te śakyā mahābhāga vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api /
GP12vd2127_u:90: prādhānyena tu mantrāṇāṃ kiñcit karma taveritam // Vdho_2,127.42 //
GP12vd2127_u:91: home yatra na nirdiṣṭaṃ mayā dravyaṃ purā tava /
GP12vd2127_u:92: havīṃṣi tatra vakṣyāmi tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu // Vdho_2,127.43 //
GP12vd2127_u:93: vṛkṣāṇāṃ yajñiyānān tu samidhaḥ prathamaṃ haviḥ /
GP12vd2127_u:94: ājyañ ca vrīhayaś caiva tathā vai gaurasarṣapāḥ // Vdho_2,127.44 //
GP12vd2127_u:95: akṣatāni tilāś caiva dadhi kṣīrañ ca bhārgava /
GP12vd2127_u:96: darbhās tathaiva dūrvāś ca bilvāni kamalāni ca // Vdho_2,127.45 //
GP12vd2127_u:100: ārṣaṃ vai daivataṃ chandas tv avijñāya bhṛgūttama /
GP12vd2127_u:101: mantrasya tena mantreṇa japyahomau na kārayet // Vdho_2,127.47 //
GP12vd2127_u:102: chandasi brāhmaṇe sūkte yad avyaktaṃ pradṛśyate /
GP12vd2127_u:103: vidvadbhiḥ saha niścitya tad yajñam avatārayet // Vdho_2,127.48 //
GP12vd2127_u:104: sambhārā ye yathā yatra yāni dravyāṇi yo vidhiḥ /
GP12vd2127_u:105: śākhāṃ prati tathā tatra tat pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ // Vdho_2,127.49 //
GP12vd2127_u:107: apramāṇam ṛṣiṃ kṛtvā so 'py adharmeṇa yujyate // Vdho_2,127.50 //
GP12vd2127_u:110: sarvakarmasu kartavye madhye karma vidhīyate // Vdho_2,127.51 //
GP12vd2127_u:111: ātharvaṇo 'yaṃ kathito vidhis te saṃkṣepato bhārgavāṃśamukhya /
GP12vd2127_u:112: ataḥ paraṃ kiṃ kathayāmi tubhyaṃ tan me vadasvāyatalohitākṣa //
GP12vd2127_u:113: // iti śriviṣṇudharmottare dvitīyakhaṇḍe mārkaṇḍeyavajrasaṃvāde rāmaṃ prati puṣkaropākhyāne 'tharvavidhikathanaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
